column1: In Jayaweera vs. Assistant Commissioner of Agrarian Services Ratnapura and Another (1996) 2
Sri. L.R. 70, in which F.N.D. Jayasuriya J. held;
"A Petitioner who is seeking relief in an application for the issue of a writ of certiorari is not
entitled to relief as a matter of course, as a matter of right or as a matter of routine. Even if he is
entitled to relief, still the Court has a discretion to deny him having regard to his conduct, delay,
laches, waiver, submission to jurisdiction- are all valid impediments which stand against the
